name: Banana Cow
description: A creamy cocktail with light rum, creme de banane, and cream.
instructions: Shake rum, creme de banana, cream, and grenadine with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with the banana slice, sprinkle nutmeg on top, and serve.

name: Barcardi Volcano
description: A flaming cocktail with Bacardi 151 proof rum and Everclear.
instructions: Put the juice of 1/2 Lime in glass, then pour in cola and barcardi dark. Top up with Everclear. Light. Figure out how to drink it!

name: Barrier Breaker
description: A coffee-based cocktail with dark rum and coffee liqueur.
instructions: Pour all of the ingreedients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Tropical Legionaire
description: Originated from the Jamaican Iced Tea, save the lack of parts needed to make it. It has a sweet flavor that reduces the numbing of the Bacardi and smoothes out the vodka. Great to make in quantity for parties just like a margarita pitcher or sangria because of its sweet flavor and easy drinkability.
instructions: Pour out the rum, triple sec, and vodka in a shaker with several cubes of ice. Swirl, then add the sweet and sour as well as the pineapple juice. Shake till the ice dissolves, then glass and garnish with the slice of pineapple. **A can of pineapple slices will also work for both the juice and pineapple slice**

name: Becky's Nectar
description: A tropical cocktail with coconut rum and raspberry vodka.
instructions: Add everything to glass with ice, stir.

name: Lakeside Lemonade
description: A refreshing lemonade cocktail with citron vodka and triple sec.
instructions: Pour the Absolut Citron and triple sec into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Almost fill with sweet and sour mix, and add a splash of lemon-lime soda and splash of cranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of lemon, and serve.

name: Misty Breeze
description: A tropical cocktail with mango rum and tropical juice.
ingredients: Captain Morgan(R) Parrot Bay mango rum
instructions: Shake in shaker with ice. Garnish with a piece of pineapple or banana with a little maraschino cherry juice and cherry on bottom.

name: Pharoah's Paradise
description: A tropical cocktail with vodka, mango rum, and blue curacao.
instructions: Fill mixing tin with ice, pineapple juice, rum, vodka, and Blue Pucker. Shake well. Strain into cocktail glass and add a splash of 7-up. Garnish with an orange slice/wedge and cherry spear.

name: Gin Aloha
description: A tropical gin cocktail with pineapple juice and orange bitters.
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Mexican Wife Beater
description: A beer cocktail with tequila, triple sec, and lager.
instructions: Pour the lemon juice, gold tequila and triple into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a beer glass. Fill glass with Stella Artois lager, and serve.

name: New Moon
description: A gin and tonic variation with triple sec and lime juice.
instructions: Pour the gin, triple sec and Rose's lime juice into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Fill with tonic water, or add to taste. Stir again gently. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

name: Traffic Light Cooler
description: A layered cocktail that creates the colors of a traffic light.
instructions: Into pilsner glass filled with ice cubes, first pour the melon liqueur, then the tequila, to create a green layer. Add sour mix. Slowly pour orange juice against side of glass to create the yellow layer. Add a few more ice cubes, if needed. Carefully float the sloe gin on top for the red layer. Garnish with a cherry and lemon and lime wheels. Stir just before drinking.

name: Banana Margarita
description: A banana-flavored margarita with creme de bananes and tequila.
instructions: Apply lemon juice to the rim of a frosted double-cocktail glass, and dip into caster sugar. Fill the glass with crushed ice, add the ingredients and blend briefly. Serve with a lemon juice-dipped slice of banana.

name: Birdman's Delight
description: A bourbon cocktail with root beer schnapps and 7-Up.
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Billy Bishop
description: Named after a Canadian World War II hero, this cocktail represents different countries with its ingredients.
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass 2/3 full with ice. Pour in the English gin and Cointreau. Put a splash of rye whiskey on top. Finish by filling the glass with orange juice.

name: Bullet to the Head
description: A strong mixed drink with vodka, rum, tequila, and gin.
instructions: Fill a collins glass with ice, pour in the ingredients as listed, then pour the glass' contents into a blender, and use the blender to make it smooth. Pour back into the glass, and serve.

name: Strawberry Mango Margarita #2
description: A fruity margarita with fresh mango and strawberries.
instructions: In a food processor, puree the mango and strawberries. You should have about 1 1/2 cups of puree. Transfer to a container, cover, and refrigerate until cold -- about 1 hour. In a blender container, combine half the puree, half the tequila, half the triple sec and half the lime juice. Fill the jar to the top with ice cubes, cover, and blend on high until thick and slushy. Transfer to a pitcher. Repeat with remaining ingredients. Stir to blend, pour into margarita glasses, and serve immediately.

name: Zocolo
description: A tropical cocktail with rum, tequila, and fruit juices.
instructions: Pour dark rum, tequila, pineapple juice and grapefruit juice into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add club soda and stir well. Garnish with a slice of orange, a pineapple wedge, and a maraschino cherry. Serve.
garnish: Orange slice, pineapple wedge, maraschino cherry

name: Brown Town Busta
description: A whiskey cocktail with Sprite Remix and orange juice.
ingredients: Jack Daniel's(R) Old No.7 Tennessee whiskey
instructions: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass, stir, and serve.

name: Double Mudd
description: A layered cocktail with gin, tequila, rum, and blue curacao.
instructions: Build over ice. Add lemon bar mix and top with cola. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

name: K-12
description: A high-energy cocktail with gin, tequila, and energy drink.
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Monte Carlo Imperial
description: A gin cocktail with creme de menthe and champagne.
instructions: Shake gin, creme de menthe and lemon juice well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Pink Goody
description: A pink cocktail with gin, rum, and lime juice.
instructions: Build in a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple slice, and serve.

name: Sugar 'n Sinz
description: A sweet cocktail with vodka, tequila, and sweet and sour mix.
instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice, shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Add a straw, and serve.

name: The Pickle Barrel
description: A strong mixed drink with vodka, tequila, rum, and gin.
instructions: Pour ingredients together over ice in a tall glass. Pour into a cocktail shaker and give one brisk shake. Pour back into glass. Garnish with a lemon. Add sugar to taste, and serve.

name: Tokyo Tea
description: A Japanese-inspired cocktail with multiple spirits and Midori.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain into a small highball glass filled with ice, and serve.

name: Cemetary Cider
description: A strong fall cocktail with spiced rum, bourbon, and apple cider.
instructions: Combine the rums and whiskey over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Add the apple cider and stir lightly. Pour into a pint glass, and serve.

name: Field Artillery Special
description: A powerful military-inspired cocktail with Everclear, bourbon, and Jagermeister.
instructions: In a shaker, combine bourbon, Jagermeister, powerade and ice. Shake well, strain and add to glass. Float everclear on top. Drink as a shooter.

name: Coral Reef
description: A tropical blue cocktail with citrus vodka, tequila, and blue curacao.
instructions: Pour vodka, tequila, and blue Curacao over ice and shake Slowly add sour mix until drink is a bright turquois. Remix and serve.

name: Grinch #2
description: A layered green cocktail that changes color from green to yellow to blue.
instructions: Fill the glass with ice and put the first 4 acohols in, the put the sweet and sour and 7-up a little more 7-up than Sweet and Sour. Then float the Blue on top. If done right it should go from green to yellow to blue.

name: Leaving Las Vegas
description: A classic long island variation with multiple spirits and lemonade.
instructions: Layer and stir, garnish with lemon

name: Long Island Iced Tea #5
description: A classic long island iced tea with vodka, gin, rum, and triple sec.
instructions: Add ice to glass. Add Alcohol. Add Sweet and Sour mix. Fill to the top with Cola (preferably Pepsi). Squeeze and add lemon

name: Red Death #3
description: A complex red cocktail with multiple spirits and fruit juices.
instructions: Mix up and serve in a highball glass with ice.

name: Red Devil
description: A devilishly red cocktail with vodka, peach schnapps, and sloe gin.
instructions: First add ice, then mix in the alcohols, then the juice and grenadine. Shake when all ingredients are mixed. Serve in a 10-12 oz. glass.

name: Sex on the Brain
description: A layered cocktail that creates a traffic light effect with green, yellow, and red layers.
instructions: Fill glass with ice, insert a straw and then add the first three ingredients (Vodka, Midori, Schnapps) then layer the juices using a barspoon to get a separation of alcohol and mixers. Leave a little room at top of glass to float the Sloe gin on top. Garnish with a cherry and orange wedge. The drink should look like a Stop Light. Green at the bottom, yellow in the middle and red on top.

name: Tie Me To The Bedpost, Baby
description: A fruity mixed cocktail with multiple liqueurs and juices.
instructions: Mix with ice in a hurricane glass.

name: Bitter Cleet
description: An original creation by Buddha Bar Dubai Bartenders with a bizarre taste sensation of bitter, pink and slightly mint.
instructions: Fill a boston glass 3/4 of ice, pour all the ingredients, shake vigorously for no more than eight seconds along with the mint leaves at the last add the mint. Use Hawthorn strainer to strain through tea strainer into frozen martini glass, this will exclude the shards of ice and the mint leaves getting into the drink. Garnish with a small mint leaves out side of the glass.

name: Amsterdamned
description: A coffee cocktail with Tia Maria, Bailey's, and champagne.
instructions: Add all the ingredients except the champagne to a cocktail shaker with some crushed ice. Shake well. Pour the champagne into a cocktail glass. Add the mixture, garnish it with some mint leaves, and serve.

name: D'Artagnan
description: A refined cocktail with armagnac, Grand Marnier, and champagne.
instructions: Chill the teaspoon amounts of liquor in a mixing glass and strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne, add strips of orange peel, and serve.

name: French 68
description: A French cocktail with brandy, Calvados, and champagne.
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, slowly fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Pick-Me-Up
description: A pick-me-up cocktail with brandy, grenadine, and champagne.
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) well over ice cubes in a shaker. Strain into a champagne flute, fill with champagne, and serve.

name: Five Hundred Proof
description: An extremely strong cocktail with multiple overproof spirits.
instructions: Shake and strain into a pilsner filled with broken ice. Garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Two Seventeen
description: A military-inspired cocktail created in Fort Richardson, Alaska by an amateur bartender/professional soldier.
instructions: Fill a pint glass about half full of ice. Pour ingredients into glass in no particular order. Shake very well. Garnish with lemon or orange slice.

name: Green Goddamn #2
description: A colorful green cocktail with multiple spirits and liqueurs.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes, and serve.

name: Honolulu Shooter
description: A tropical gin shooter with pineapple and citrus juices.
instructions: Shake, strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Jamaica Glow
description: A gin cocktail with Jamaican rum, red wine, and orange juice.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Suffering Bastard
description: A classic cocktail with gin, rum, lime juice, and ginger ale.
instructions: Pour ingredients into a glass. Stir. Drink.

name: Summer Sunset
description: A refreshing summer cocktail with white rum, fruit punch, and ginger ale.
instructions: Put ice cubes in the Collins glass. Then poor the white rum. Fill with the fruit punch and the ginger ale.

name: Sexual Harrasement
description: A mixed shot with Crown Royal, amaretto, and sloe gin.
instructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin with ice. Shake and strain.

name: A Little Bit Of Maeve
description: A layered shot with amaretto, sloe gin, and Southern Comfort.
instructions: Shake everything except orange juice in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Fill a glass with orange juice and drop the shot glass in. Serve.

name: Anthrax
description: A strong shot with spiced rum, white rum, and Canadian whisky.
instructions: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

name: Dirty Bloody Red Headed Slut
description: A complex cocktail with Jagermeister, Kahlua, and mixed juices.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, and serve without ice in a small rocks glass.

name: Electric Cool-Aid
description: An electric cocktail with multiple liqueurs and cranberry juice.
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in shots and fill with equal parts cranberry and sour mix.

name: Mandarin
description: A complex cocktail with multiple herbal liqueurs and cream.
instructions: Blend briefly with three-quarters of a glassful of crushed ice. Serve in a double-cocktail glass garnished with a slice of orange speared with a cherry.

name: Of Darkness
description: A dark cocktail with multiple herbal liqueurs and whisky.
instructions: Stir ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: 6 Wise Men
description: A powerful whiskey cocktail combining six different whiskeys.
instructions: Pour all 6 whiskeys into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice cubes, and serve.

name: Blue Ball
description: A blue cocktail with raspberry vodka, coconut rum, and blue curacao.
instructions: Pour one part of all three ingredients into a shaker, with ice. Mix well and serve as double shots.

name: California Martini
description: A California-style martini with vodka, red wine, and dark rum.
instructions: Pour the vodka, red wine, dark rum and orange bitters into a cocktail shaker half-filled with cracked ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist, and serve.

name: Candy Fireball
description: A sweet and spicy cocktail with vodka, Aftershock, and ginger ale.
instructions: Build over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

name: Hill Topper
description: A mixed cocktail with vodka, dark rum, and Southern Comfort.
instructions: Build over ice. Stir and garnish with a lime slice.

name: One Fruity Tutti
description: A fruity blended cocktail with vodka, coconut rum, bananas, and strawberries.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender with enough ice to achieve a smooth consistancy. Serve in coupe glass.

name: Snowballs
description: A frozen blended cocktail with vodka, rum, and peach schnapps.
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend on high until the ice is crushed completely. Pour into a collins glass, and serve into two highball glasses or one very tall glass.

name: Fat Hooker
description: A tropical cocktail with vodka, peach schnapps, and Malibu rum.
instructions: Pour first three ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange or pinapple juice, stir well, and serve.

name: Illusion
description: A tropical shot with Malibu rum, Midori, vodka, and pineapple juice.
instructions: pour all spirits in the shaker ... & top with a splash of pineapple juice

name: M.V.P.
description: A tropical cocktail with vodka, Midori, Malibu rum, and pineapple juice.
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add vodka, midori, and malibu. Fill with pineapple juice. Stir or shake.

name: Something Peachie #1
description: A peachy cocktail with vodka, peach schnapps, and fruit juices.
instructions: serve in a tall glass over ice garnish with a cherry and orange

name: Swimming Pool
description: A blue cocktail with rum, vodka, blue curacao, and cream.
instructions: Mix ingredients with some ice in a shaker. Strain into a glass over some ice.

name: Trailer Wench
description: A strong cocktail with Midori, vodka, 151 proof rum, and grape juice.
instructions: Pour each ingredient as listed.

name: Tropical Itching
description: A tropical cocktail with rum, vodka, Grand Marnier, and mango juice.
instructions: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange, a cherry and a sprig of mint.

name: Arlingtonian
description: Invented at the 2007 Foxfield Races in Charlottesville, Virginia. A smooth, classy cocktail that packs a punch.
instructions: Combine the bourbon, white wine, and ginger ale over ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Taxidermy
description: A citrus cocktail with vanilla vodka, Mountain Dew, and grenadine.
instructions: Fill glass with ice, pour one ounce of Vanilla Stoli. Top off all but 1/4 of the glass with Mountain Dew. Finish off with a hefty splash of Grenadine syrup and garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry.

name: Lucifers Tears
description: A complex herbal cocktail with gin, Galliano, and multiple liqueurs.
instructions: Stir and strain all but blueberry liqueur into glass, then dribble blueberry liqueur over top.

name: Jack Me Off
description: A melon cocktail with Applejack brandy, Midori, and 7-Up.
instructions: Pour the Applejack brandy and Midori melon liqueur into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with 7-up, and serve.

name: Strawberry Fields Forever
description: A refreshing strawberry cocktail with brandy and strawberry schnapps.
instructions: Pour brandy and schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a strawberry and serve.

name: Strawberry Quick
description: A pink strawberry cocktail with schnapps, Irish cream, and milk.
instructions: Mix the contents so that the color of the drink is a pink color. Serve and enjoy

name: Strawberry Starburst
description: A fruity cocktail with strawberry and watermelon schnapps and lemonade.
instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add schnapps and lemonade. Shake or stir. Garnish with a sugared strawberry if desired.

name: Suitor
description: A layered cocktail with Drambuie, orange liqueur, and Bailey's Irish cream.
instructions: Pour in order.

name: Sunding Over the top
description: A citrus rum cocktail with Bacardi Limon, 7-Up, and sour mix.
instructions: Pour the bacardi then the 7-up, sour mix and finally the russchian on top. Use a lot of ice.

name: Sweet Treat
description: A sweet cocktail with Tia Maria, Galliano, and Coca-Cola.
instructions: Pour Tia Maria and Galliano over ice, and fill to taste with Coca Cola

name: T N T Cocktail
description: An explosive cocktail with cognac, Cointreau, bitters, and absinthe.
instructions: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Talbot's Dream
description: A creamy blended cocktail with white Godiva liqueur and Bailey's Irish cream.
instructions: Add Godiva and the Bailey's in a blender. Add ice to desired thickness. Blend well.

name: Tangerine Dream
description: A citrus cocktail with Mandarine Napoleon, Tia Maria, and cream.
instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Decorate with coffee beans and hearts cut from the rind of a tangerine.

name: Thunder
description: A spicy brandy cocktail with powdered sugar and cayenne pepper.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

name: Toasted Fisherman
description: A whiskey cocktail with Crown Royal, amaretto, and sweet and sour mix.
instructions: Mix all ingredients over ice stir and serve with a cherry

name: Astronaut
description: A space-themed cocktail with vodka, rum, and pineapple juice.
instructions: Pour the vodka, light rum and dark rum into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add Sprite and a splash of pineapple juice. Serve with a twist of lime (or lemon), and serve.

name: Flying Angel
description: A tropical cocktail with vodka, coconut rum, and fruit juices.
instructions: In a shaker with ice, pour everything but grenadine and shake. Pour contents into an old fashioned glass and drip grenadine for color. Top with cherry and garnish with pineapple or orange slice.

name: High on Irony
description: An ironic cocktail with rum, vodka, and fruit punch.
instructions: Pour the lime juice, soda, and punch into the glass, then add the rum and vodka. Shake and add ice. Top with a cherry. Serve.

name: Creamy Crotch
description: A creamy cocktail with vodka, Jack Daniel's, cream, and cocoa powder.
instructions: Add all ingredients to an old-fashioned glass. Stir well, and serve.

name: Long Kiss Goodnight Martini
description: A vanilla martini with vodka, creme de cacao, and shaved white chocolate.
instructions: Freeze a martini glass and it in shaved chocolate to rim. In a shaker put ice, Stoli vanilla, Stoli vodka, and white creme de cacao. Shake lightly and pour into martini glass. Garnish with chocolate kiss.

name: Infidelity
description: A fruity cocktail with vodka, triple sec, and mixed fruit punches.
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half-filled with crushed ice, and shake well. Strain into a collins glass half-filled with crushed ice, and serve.

name: March Madness On Crack
description: An energetic cocktail with vodka, triple sec, and energy drinks.
instructions: Mix everything together and drink it.

name: Wild Black Betty
description: A strong shot with multiple whiskeys and liqueurs.
instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker over ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass, and serve.

name: Crap Schnapps
description: A mixed schnapps shot with cinnamon, root beer, apple, and peach.
instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and strain

name: Jager Shaker #3
description: A Jagermeister shot with root beer schnapps and cream.
instructions: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into glass.

name: Hell No
description: A strong shot with Everclear, peach schnapps, and mixed ingredients.
instructions: Pour and stir each ingredient into a mixing glass with ice, stirring continuously. Strain into shot glasses, and serve.

name: Executive Sunrise
description: A tequila sunrise variation with gold tequila and creme de cassis.
instructions: Pour the tequila and the orange juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the center of the drink.

name: Acapulco Dream Cream
description: A tropical tequila cocktail with coconut cream and cinnamon.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a cocktail glass. Dust with cinnamon, and serve.

name: Big Apple Margarita
description: An apple margarita with tequila, apple liqueur, and lemon juice.
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a slice of green apple, and serve.

name: Blue Canary
description: A blue gin cocktail with grapefruit juice and blue curacao.
instructions: Pour the gin, grapefruit juice and blue curacao into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint, and serve.

name: Dragon Piss #2
description: A tequila cocktail with Midori and Mountain Dew.
instructions: Pour the tequila and Midori liqueur into a cocktail glass. Top with Mountain Dew, and serve.

name: Blavod Martini
description: A black vodka martini with sweet vermouth and maraschino cherry.
instructions: Shake well with ice and strain into martini glass. Add cherry.

name: Chocolate Martini #3
description: A chocolate martini with vanilla vodka and Godiva liqueur.
instructions: Mix vanilla vodka and chocolate liqueur in shaker filled with ice. Strain into either wine glass or martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: The Chocolate Martini
description: A classic chocolate martini with vanilla vodka and chocolate liqueur.
instructions: Combine ingredients in cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into chilled martini glass.

name: Daylon's Bedtime
description: A vanilla vodka cocktail with triple sec and 7-Up.
instructions: Pour vanilla vodka into ice filled glass. Add Triple Sec. Add Soda to taste. Mix with straw.

name: Longaberger Lemonade
description: A cranberry vodka lemonade with triple sec and 7-Up.
instructions: Combine ingredients in collins glass filled with ice.

name: Nummer 10
description: A raspberry vodka cocktail with Kahlua and Russian soda.
instructions: Fill the glass up to 1/3 with raspberry vodka. Scatter a few drops of Kalhua into the raspberry vodka and mix it. Be careful, it?s important not to get to much Kalhua. Fill up the glass with Schweppes Russchian and the Nummer 10(C) is complete. Enjoy!

name: Strawberry Dream #2
description: A strawberry vodka cocktail with amaretto and 7-Up.
instructions: Shake vodka and amaretto. Fill with 7-Up.

name: Absolut Blue Lemonade
description: A blue vodka lemonade with blue curacao.
instructions: Shake and serve on ice.

name: Allietini
description: A vodka cocktail with Chambord raspberry liqueur and sugar rim.
instructions: Rim cocktail glass with sugar and set aside. Add Ketel One and Chambord to a mixer with ice, shake vigorously, and pour into glass. Garnish with small lemon peel if desired. Drink by sipping on sugar. Rotate glass with each sip so that sugar is always obtained with drink. You should have finished the sugar when you've finished the drink.

name: Cherry Gimlet
description: A cocktail with 1 1/2 oz smirnoff(r) vodka and other ingredients.
instructions: Garnish a cocktail glass with 1 to 2 marashino cherries and a few ice cubes. Shake all ingredients with ice to chill and then strain into the glass and serve.

name: Citrus Eden
description: A cocktail with svedka(r) clementine vodka and other ingredients.
instructions: A very herbal tasting drink, yet sweet, cold & refreshing. A blend of citrus with a distinctive green hue that tantalizes ones senses while everyone else turns green with envy of such a pretty drink. Fill average to large blender with ice. Pour in Svedka Clementine vodka over the ice and fill between the quarter & half mark. Splash in some orange juice until the fluid resembles an orange juice shade of yellow. Pluck leaves from mint & lemon verbena, add to blender. Allow blender to pulse/mix vigorously until mixture resembles an avocado colored slush. Pour into margarita glass and adorn with lime slice and mint sprigs.

name: Aloha
description: A cocktail with 1/2 oz dark rum and other ingredients.
instructions: Shake with ice cubes and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: French 75
description: A cocktail with 1 1/2 oz gin and other ingredients.
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the champagne. Stir well and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Frizzy Punch
description: A cocktail with 2 bottles everclear and other ingredients.
instructions: Pour all of the ingredients in a trash can or large cooler. Stir until completely mixed.

name: Fireman's Sour
description: A cocktail with 1 1/2 oz light rum and other ingredients.
instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lime juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the club soda. Stir well. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

name: Whop Me Down Sweet Jesus
description: A cocktail cocktail with vodka
instructions: Best in large mason jar. Blue going down Blue coming up.

name: Breath of God #2
description: A shot cocktail with rum
instructions: "Add the Bacardi silver rum, Crown Royal and Wild Turkey whiskeys to a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a large shot glass or small old-fashioned/lowball glass. Splash cranberry juice on top, float the Bacardi 151 on top, and serve. There is a routine that you do while taking this shot. 1. Breath in deep2. Exhale ALL the air out3. Take the shot4. Immediately after the last drop is down inhale deep.5. Hold Breath6. Slowly let out air through nose. The headrush is phenomonal. If you do not know how to float a liquor well then you may mess this up."

name: Applejack (Jack Daniel's original recipe)
description: A cocktail cocktail with 1 part jack daniels
instructions: Mix in glass on the rocks.

name: Axelrod's Sweet Concoction
description: A cocktail cocktail with 1 2/3 oz amaretto
instructions: Serve iced, stirred, not shaken

name: Grand Master
description: A cocktail cocktail with whiskey
instructions: Pour the Scotch, schnapps, and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: Hennyville Slugger
description: A cocktail cocktail with brandy
instructions: Fill hiball glass with 5-7 ounces of cognac. Next, fill remainder of glass with lemon-lime soda. Finally, squeeze 1/2 of medium size lemon and garnish with 1/4 inch lemon wedges.

name: Venus on the Rocks
description: A cocktail cocktail with 1 oz amaretto
instructions: The finished drink should be the golden color of perfectly tanned skin. Use this as a guide and don't get hung up on volume measurements.
